title: Miser's Purse, 1890–1910
medium:
Medium: silk, glass beads, metal
Technique: knitting with openwork stitch
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: Miser's purse with center slit and movable ring. Knitted in an openwork stitch in blue silk strung with clear glass beads.  A small tassel at each end of strung glass beads.  Worked flat and seamed leaving a central slit.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, 1890–1910.
1890–1910. Medium: silk, glass beads, metal
Technique: knitting with openwork stitch. Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper. 1957-180-19.
